props.title: Welcome to Astra CMS
props.subtitle: AI-First Content Management
props.description: Build and manage content with AI assistance. Designed for organizations where tech teams set up, design teams customize, and content teams edit.

features.title: Tech Team
features.description: Clone the repo, set up infrastructure, deploy and maintain. Full control over the codebase.

features.title: Design Team
features.description: Create blocks and components using AI tools like Cursor or Claude Code. No need to understand the full codebase.

features.title: Content Team
features.description: Edit pages through the Admin UI. No coding required. Just pick blocks and fill in content.

features.title: Block-Based
features.description: Pages are composed of blocks. Each block has a schema, version, and renderer.

features.title: Local or Firebase
features.description: Works locally with JSON files. Switch to Firebase for production.

features.title: i18n Built-in
features.description: Locale-aware routing from day one. Support multiple languages and regions.

features.title: Role-Based Access
features.description: Admin, editor, and viewer roles for controlling who can do what.

props.title: Ready to get started?
props.description: Ask your AI assistant to read ONBOARDING.md for a step-by-step guide to building or migrating your site.

props.content:
Quick Start

  1. AI Onboarding: Ask your AI to read ONBOARDING.md for a guided setup
  2. Explore: This page loads from /content/pages/page_home.json
  3. Edit: Open the Admin at /admin to manage pages
  4. Create Blocks: Add new blocks in /src/blocks/ - each block is a folder with index.ts and renderer.tsx
  5. Deploy: When ready for production, switch to Firebase in /src/infrastructure/index.ts

Features

  • Redirects: Old URLs automatically redirect to new ones when you rename pages
  • Revision History: Every edit is tracked - restore any previous version
  • Scheduled Publishing: Set content to go live at a future date
  • Locale-specific URLs: Different paths per language (e.g., /services vs /palvelut)
  • Blog & Team: Built-in support for posts and team member collections
